scenario.property: This scenario performs DC Shipping and Receiving activity for fixed readers as well as handheld

activity.name: SetNoStoreInfoReadError
activity.input: "Store id part of barcode is missing"

var.name: ${process.scenarioName}
var.property: Scenario Instance name for UI display

var.name: ${process.asnExpected}
var.property: Specify if UI display should be ON.

var.name: ${process.asnMode}
var.property: <option SELECTED value="BARCODE">Barcode scan for Carton ID</option> <option value="WMS">WMS Integration</option> <option value="LOCAL">Scenario will create ASN</option>

var.name: ${process.generateASN}
var.property: Specify if ASN is to be distributed on End Trigger

var.name: ${process.shipToDesc}
var.property: Specify Ship to Destination parameter for virtual ASN.

var.name: ${process.defaultShipToDescBarcodeMode}
var.property: Specify default Ship to Destination parameter for Box search in Barcode mode.

var.name: ${process.locSubType}
var.property: Specify Location SubType for virtual ASN. Note location subtype should map to location of destination OATXpress where EPCs should be auto-received.

var.name: ${process.sessionStartDeviceEpcAndPoint}
var.property: Specify the digital input device for starting session

var.name: ${process.sessionPointStateForStart}
var.property: Input State for Session Start Trigger

var.name: ${process.sessionStopDeviceEpcAndPoint}
var.property: Specify the digital input device for stopping session

var.name: ${process.sessionPointStateForStop}
var.property: Input State for Session Stop Trigger

var.name: ${process.historyLength}
var.property: Number of History Points to Filter Reads

var.name: ${process.numTriesBeforeFailure}
var.property: Number of Tries to Confirm Hardware Trigger Failure

var.name: ${process.configDevicePointForStart}
var.property: <option SELECTED value="01">01</option> <option value="02">02</option> <option value="03">03</option> <option value="04">04</option> <option value="05">05</option> <option value="06">06</option> <option value="07">07</option> <option value="08">08</option>

var.name: ${process.configDevicePointEpcForEnd}
var.property: <option value="01">01</option> <option value="02">02</option> <option SELECTED value="03">03</option> <option value="04">04</option> <option value="05">05</option> <option value="06">06</option> <option value="07">07</option> <option value="08">08</option>

var.name: ${process.configDevicePoint7EpcForEnd}
var.property: Input Point to Indicate End of Process

<option value="01">01</option> <option value="02">02</option> <option value="03">03</option> <option value="04">04</option> <option value="05">05</option> <option value="06">06</option> <option SELECTED value="07">07</option> <option value="08">08</option>

var.name: ${process.devicePoint7StateForEnd}
var.property: Input State for End of Process Input Point

var.name: ${process.configDevicePoint5EpcForAntennaStatus}
var.property: Input Point to Indicate Antenna Status

<option value="01">01</option> <option value="02">02</option> <option value="03">03</option> <option value="04">04</option> <option SELECTED value="05">05</option> <option value="06">06</option> <option value="07">07</option> <option value="08">08</option>

var.name: ${process.configDevicePoint6EpcForDeviceStatus}
var.property: Input Point to Indicate Reader Status

<option value="01">01</option> <option value="02">02</option> <option value="03">03</option> <option value="04">04</option> <option value="05">05</option> <option SELECTED value="06">06</option> <option value="07">07</option> <option value="08">08</option>

var.name: ${process.transitLocation}
var.property: Specify business location to assign EPCs

var.name: ${process.transitLocationRP}
var.property: Specify initial read point to assign EPCs
